subject: Order Issue
description_text:
Hello -

I ordered the Plus X P2-H2 in Black with Base Plate from Amazon. The pedals arrived today but there was no Base or Heel plate. 

I sent a message through Amazon, but am also reaching out here. 

My Amazon Order number is Order #
114-1196793-1596211 and my UPS tracking number was 1ZH912Y00307971633

I’m very excited to use these pedals and would appreciate your help in getting the base plate and heel plate to me so that I can use them!

Thank you in advance for your help!

Mike Gallagher

conversations.body_text: Hi Ashier-kiln51,     ​I am sorry for it. Due to a current shortage of black base plates in our US warehouse, we have sent you the pedals first. The black base plate arrived at the warehouse on Wednesday. And we have shipped your base plate, here is your UPS tracking number: 1ZH912Y00315305954
